name: Theca
tagline: A simple, fully featured command line note taking tool written in Rust
body:
## Updated!

Theca is once again a maintained project! It has been updated to compile on all current versions of `rustc`, linted with `clippy`, and regularly building on `travis`. I have updated the version to `1.0.0`, and published it to `crates.io` to allow for installation via `cargo install`. 

I am welcoming bugs/features/whatever, so please `cargo install theca`, start using it, and file bugs at [https://github.com/pwoolcoc/theca](https://github.com/pwoolcoc/theca)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
